'''Record of the Search for Glory''' is a subevent during [[Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures]].

It can be accessed at the {{Icon|Record of the Search for Glory}} icons.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures Record of the Search for Glory 1.png
|text1  = When the Echoing Conch plays, it will display {{color|help|possible}} Iridescent Glory locations on your minimap and in your field of view. Collect the designated number of said Glories to complete the challenge.
|image2 = Tutorial Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures Record of the Search for Glory 2.png
|text2  =  Some materials require [[Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrant]] abilities to collect...
}}
